name: The Reminiscent
description:
This is a set of prompts to be used in the solo letter-writing game ghostbox by Marx of High Water. You use the suit of Hearts from a standard deck of cards to play.

CW: Parenthood, children.

These prompts have you writing letters to an old friend, one from a time you were wilder and had fewer responsibilities. You are writing to them about your child/children and how life has changed. 

The tone of the letters is intended to be a mix between hopeful and joyful for the children, and melancholy for a distant past.
